articles.title: Live Gas prices surge 10pc as Russia cuts supplies - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: Gas prices have surged for a second day as Russia continues to cut supplies to Europe in the new year.
articles.content:
Happy New Year!
There's no sign of the January blues on the markets this morning, with the FTSE 100 poised to make strong gains in its first day of trading in 2022.

articles.title: Motorola Moto G71 5G India Launch Date Set for January 10: Expected Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Motorola Moto G71 5G India launch date has been set for January 10. The Motorola phone was initially launched in Europe in November last year. The smartphone comes with triple rear cameras, a hole-punch display design, and Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 SoC.
articles.content: Motorola Moto G71 5G India launch date has been set for January 10, the Chinese company confirmed on Tuesday. The Motorola phone debuted in Europe in November last year. It comes with features includ… [+1925 chars]

articles.title: Red Planet or Red Velvet Cake? ESA Releases Delightful Image of Mars - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Mars has long been a sort of an enigma to astronomers. An image released recently by the European Space Agency (ESA) reinforces the mystery around the Red Planet. The image, captured by the Trace Gas Orbiter (TGO), showed Mars as a stunningly delightful cake.
